actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

actions.subcommittee: International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services
actions.text: Committee on Governmental Affairs referred to Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 36 of title 39, United States Code, to provide for a permanent postal rate for certain educational bound printed matter, and for other purposes.
short_title: Educational Matter Postal Rate Act of 2001

summary.text: Educational Matter Postal Rate Act of 2001 - Amends Federal postal law to provide for a permanent postal rate (permitting no increases in rate) for certain educational bound printed matter.

titles.title: Educational Matter Postal Rate Act of 2001
A bill to amend chapter 36 of title 39, United States Code, to provide for a permanent postal rate for certain educational bound printed matter, and for other purposes.
